titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to take certain tribally-owned reservation land into trust for the Puyallup Tribe.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-422.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 231.

bill.summary: 4/25/2006--Reported to House amended. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to take certain tribally-owned reservation land into trust for the Puyallup Tribe.
